description:
A trainee assassin gets sent to take on Dororo for a graduation exam.  But how can he possibly defeat such a powerful assassin?!  Then Natsumi finds a bluebird she wants to keep as a pet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dororo - The Chance is Important! / Natsumi - My Bluebird
ドロロ キッカケが大事! / 夏美 私の青い鳥
